item.description: Quebec City seems to have copied the idea of Boston's Freedom Trail with their very own VivaCite Trail. The trail is 5.3 km (3.3 mi) and takes about 4 hours. It will take us through Faubourg Saint-Jean Baptiste, Quarties Saint-Roch, Vieux Port, Place-Royale and Quartier Petit Champlain, mais oui, tout ca! The trail takes us by the parliament building, Battlefields park, trendy neighbourhoods, the walled city, a chocalote shop and museum (mmm!) and the old port. We'll stop somewhere along the way for lunch.
item.name: VivaCite Trail walk in Quebec
